headline: Should FirstEnergy’s (FE) US$36 Billion Grid Push and Higher Dividend Target Require Investor Action?
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. recently reported full-year 2025 results, with revenue rising to US$15.09 billion and net income reaching US$1.02 billion, alongside a higher quarterly dividend of US$0.465 per share and a targeted US$1.86 per share payout for 2026. At the same time, the company outlined a US$36.00 billion five-year grid and generation investment plan, signaling a major shift toward large-scale transmission upgrades and new gas-fired capacity to support reliability and growing power...
